comment: Professor Doss is amazing! I took her class online for English 1101 and it was a piece of cake. You only do like 3 essays, plus a few discussion posts and short answer writings. As long as you follow the rubrics she will grade you fairly. Gives feedback and answers fast! Definitely take her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Very simple and straightforward class but the professor does not respond to emails. Many due dates on the module are wrong as well, so it is hard to figure out what needs to be done. On the class side, very simple: only textbook assignments and small assignments leading up to a final research paper due at the end of the semester.

Do not take her if you need more clarification sometimes. She does NOT answer emails. I just received my final grade for her and I have emails from the beginning of the semester that she still has not answered. Theres also about 6 thinks your final grade is based off of which is ridiculous.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Professor Doss is a great teacher. Super organized and easy to know what will be due without missing any deadline. She is always available to help. Overall she makes her class easy by keeping everything organized and spread out where you are not overwhelmed some weeks.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Great online class, the textbook she uses is legitimately great. She also releases summary videos with it, and she is very invested in the class & gives good feedback. The criteria was obvious, and if you put in the work you will get an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: She's an absolutely lovely woman! Brilliant teacher, kind as can be, understanding of personal problems, and very generous grading. As long as you treat it like a class, you'll be fine! And make sure for your research topic, you pick something you have passion behind.

She is great at feedback and explaining the course. The reading is not bad at all, and the papers were actually fun to write. They weren't your typical high school prompt, very interesting. The final is an easy A (no excuses). She is sweet and makes the course enjoyable. I took this online, and it was probably the best thing to do!

Professor Doss is one of my favorite online professors I've had at KSU. The assignments are very clear and easy to do. The essays are also very simple an she's an easy grader. You won't regret taking her!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I took her online class and it was pretty easy. She provides links to the required reading a and theres a weekly quiz on them. Theres also a written quiz where you write about new concepts learned that week. Occasionally a discussion post. No exams, but she takes forever to grade papers.

She is very sweet but her assignment details can be kind of confusing!! I emailed her multiple times and never got a response. I did assignments the day they were due and got A's on them but I wish she wouldn't make assignments so confusing.

Seriously the best online 1102 class. Super nice and helpful when you have questions. Uses an interactive online book. Only have 1 research paper and other assignments related to it (annotated bib, topic proposal...) very generous grader. Very easy to make an A. Definitely recommend. Really easy quizzes no webcam/ lockdown. Other small assignments.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: This class is an easy A as long as you complete the assignments. I had her online and there are reading assignments plus essays. I did everything the night before or the night it was due and still got an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I had professor Doss online and she was an excellent professor. She responds to emails fairly quickly and will work with you to help you do your best. We had 3 essays as well as weekly quizzes and other weekly assignments. She is so sweet and I will be taking her for 1102 because I enjoyed her class so much.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: She is really helpful when you need more explanation on an assignment. Whenever you email her she responds very quickly. The assignments aren't too hard. If you follow the rubric you will get an A on every assignment.

She's so so sweet! Definitely taking her again for english 1102. She really cares about her students and their success and is so caring and helpful. She doesn't expect too much from her students, so she was always impressed when you work hard. She is clear about what she wants and will go out of her way to make sure you understand.
Professor Doss is great. I took her for 1101 and 1102 and got A's in both. She wants you to do well in her class, take her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: All reading material is given to you online. Few papers to write. Few assignments each week and all easily accessed online. Easy A.

Professor Doss is one of the best teachers yet! Super easy A!!!! Might be a little longer reading material, but she's awesome at spreading everything out and giving you time! I hope other people enjoy taking her class as much as I did!

Lots of reading and papers, but nothing crazy (even with my FT job and four kids). Gives thorough feedback, but it doesn't always line up with the grade you receive. I had points deducted on a couple of papers, but her feedback didn't explain why, which can be frustrating when you're trying to improve. Great lectures, great D2L setup.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Hilarious

comment: This was my first online class and I made an A. Prof. Doss is the best! She is very helpful, always available, and wants you to succeed. Her online class has no textbooks, and her exam questions are hilarious! One of our final exam questions: "Rick Astley will never...a) give you up b) let you down c) run around d) all of the above" :-)
Amazing teacher and always gives feedback. She doesn't want to see you fail which shows how caring she really is. I would take her again.
Professor Doss grades very fairly and provides great feedback on Elireview and D2L, take her if you are looking for a reasonably easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Took professor Doss summer online ENG 1102 and it was great! Easy to reach she provides her personal cell number to text or you can email her. Several essays however, she provided video explaining what she wants and how and provides examples. You wont be disappointed, essay A, just follow directions!

I took her summer class. She never graded work on time nor gave feedback. Barely replies to emails, impossible to get a hold of. Work made no sense, she used my class as guinea pigs for new assignments that she didn't even know how to grade. Unorganized and never payed attention my questions or concerns.

Professor Doss is a truly great professor. You can tell she really cares about her students. The work in her class isn't very difficult and she gives you plenty of time and resources so you can get the best possible grade. If you don't understand something she is quick to respond and help you out.

I had Professor Doss for ENGL 1101 and 1102 online. I am a non-traditional student and work full time. By creating weekly videos to go over the coursework, concise instructions within D2L, accessibility for questions, and passion about the subject matter, Professor Doss made the online learning experience extraordinarily enjoyable!

One of the nicest teachers Ive had, I took her online class and she was amazing. Really cares about her students. Theres a lot of papers, but their not too hard because she lets you submit a rough draft into peer review before the final is submitted, so that you can get feed back. I reccomend this class if you need to take engl1102.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--SO MANY PAPERS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Doss is super nice and very responsive to questions.  Lots of homework and writing assignments, but her feedback is very detailed.  Would definitely take a class with her again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: I had this professor for Engl 1101 and 1102. Writing is not my strong suit, yet the way she has designed her class really makes the end papers easy to write. Her lectures are well informed, she texts and responds quickly and doesn't make you feel like an idiot for asking a question. LOVE this professor!

Took this class online.  Professor Doss is one of my favorite professors at KSU.  I took her for ENG1101 and ENG1102.  If you do the work and submit the assignments on time, you will get a great grade.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Took this class online.  Professor Doss is one of my favorite professors at KSU.  She is very caring and responsive, and makes the content interesting.  She can be disorganized at times, but it doesn't matter.  She grades fairly, and genuinely cares about her students.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Yes, she assigns a great deal of work each week, but she is very helpful.  If you ever have a question, she is more than willing to help you.  Nicest professor that I have ever had.  I would take her again.  Do not procrastinate in her class.

Complete overload on online assignments each week. More work in this class than my science and history classes combined.  Very helpful and nice but the workload is unmanageable if u have a full load.  I think I spent 14 hours last week on reading, online assignments, and essays.

I'm taking her class now and while she is a very nice teacher, the amount of homework is completely overwhelming.  I put in hours a day trying to read the book and do the assignments in mindtap.  Too many assignments plus writing papers.  It is very difficult to keep track if you have completed all of your work for the week.

I took the onliine class last semester and she is clear in her assignments, but she is harsh in grading.  There is a huge amount of work due each week, so you have to make sure you don't miss any assignments.  Very challenging class for me and I'm an A student.

Clear on what she wants for each assignment and offers examples for each paper so you know if you're going in the right direction. However, she was really unorganized. I found myself at the end of the semester missing half of my grades (which were supposed to be put in 2 weeks after the due date). Would take her again if she was more organized.

Great Teacher. She's funny, laid back, and very helpful. I took the Hybrid course she offers and I'm also taking her  online ENG1102 class this summer. We had papers about every 2-3 weeks and she has workshops and rough drafts for the week before.  Not much work. Online work was minimal and pretty easy.  Easy A.
Lots of homework assignments each week for onlinee class.  She is a little harsh on grading.  Very nice, but too strict on essay content.  I thought my papers were quite good.

I think she is by far one of the most helpful professors I have had. I am taking her class online and she will have Skype meetings with me to talk about anything that I don't understand. I have missed a few assignments and she let me turn them in late and gave full credit. I missed the date for the submission for extra credit and she still let me.

Every assignment leads up to the research paper as well as a final research project. Final paper is 10 pages double spaced in MLA format which may seem like too much but after everything you have done all semester, it is not that bad. Very easy grader and gives great feedback on assignments.
Nice teacher, grades a  little harshly, tons of assignnments each week.

For the oonline class, there are so many assignment each week.   So much extra work compared to classroom classes.  Ridiculous work load and she grades assignments too harshly for a required engl 1101 class.  Not all of us are great writers.

Professor Doss is one of the nicest, most understanding teachers I've come cross.  She is willing to help you understand the material, work with you if a problem arises, and cares about her students.  This was a hybrid class and had a lot of work, but I learned a lot and was successful.

What a great person. Very kind, helpful, and understanding professor. Work consists of reading and providing discussion posts for The Tipping Point (read by many business professionals) and tons of writing assignments that will feed into a research paper (topic of your choosing). Not a tough grader but you have to keep up with the work.

One of my favorite teachers. I made an A in my first Lit class (hybrid) and took the second online. During the course I ended up having a schizophrenic break, but since I didn't have a diagnosis yet I couldn't get accommodations through the school. She worked with me and I was able to finish the class with a C. I will always appreciate her for that
took the hybrid.  Lots of  busy work .  So much work due each week.  Hard grader.  Hard to keep track of assignments.
She is an amazing teacher, very funny and easy to relate to. I had her in class and she was very good with our grades and helped us a lot if we did not understand what ever she assigned.

This was a great class for me. Mrs Doss is by far the best english teacher I've ever had and if you have the chance to take her you should. You will get a good grade if thats what you desire. She helps students to their fullest potential.

As a hybrid class, there are assignments for every week. She is outgoing and a very sweet teacher but takes a good while to get back to emails so try and ask in person. Not much of a tough grader and assignments are well explained. Just do the work and you should be good. The essays are not bad! She lets you choose the topic you're interested in.
Alot of work but very easy stuff, have one topic that you follow for the whole semester and research it, grades pretty easily but can be hard to get in touch with at some times.

She is a very swee tlady and loves teaching. She makes the class interesting and is very stylish. I took her as a hybrid so all the work was online, it got kinda confusing at first because she is a little unorganized. But overall a very good professor

Dr. Doss is a great professor for English. There is a weekly folder of assignments and you spend all semester focusing on one paper. She is very helpful and understanding. I definitely recommend her, if you're willing to work.

I'm taking her hybrid class and she is great! She is extremely sweet and her assignments are pretty easy and you will be successful if you just keep up...which is very easy to do. Overall, I recommend her for 1101 for sure!

Took online class, very very easy as long as you do your work. No tests or finals. A few quizzes on assigned book, discussions, exercises from textbook, and several papers focused on one research topic. 7-10 page paper is considered final. As long as you are comfortable with writing a lot, this is an easy class!

Take the hybrid class. She is very clear and her assignments are not difficult. All her quizes are online and questions are right out of the book. You need to buy the books because you do use them. I would take this class again in the future.

Took online class. Insisted she was available on her syllabus and announcements. Was not. Never responded on emails, seemed to get very behind. Many busy work assignments help your grade but due dates are mixed up all the time. Not clear AT ALL.

I took Dr. Doss's class online. Very easy class if you try your best on the essays and do all of your assignments. Your essays all revolved around the same research topic (which you choose), so it makes writing a little easier. The downside is she seems to be disorganized and gets behind while grading. Other then that, I recommend you take her.

I took this teacher based on all of her wonderful comments but I was very disappointed. However, I was taking her online class. It was very confusing and unclear. I missed assignments and would send her emails with an extremely slow response time. Grades took forever to come back and with the exception of 1 paper, there was never any feedback.

Very nice teacher, makes class somewhat fun. Very easy A, I recommend taking the hybrid class, only meet once a week and everything's turned in online. Very convenient! Only downside is she seems to get behind on grading essays and she sometimes gives bad writers good grades out of sympathy.

Ms. Doss was a great professor. I took her hybrid class. The 3-4 textbooks she says you need, you don't. All the essays in them can be found online. Weekly assignments and 4-5 essay. Very sweet and nice lady! Not very responsive to emails but if you talk to her in person she will help you with anything you need!

I took this class online and Ms. Doss was awesome. The only problem I ran into was the calendar was a little mixed up in the beginning and I ended up missing an assignment which probably ended up me getting a lower grade. However, I really learned a lot and I did enjoy her taking her class. I highly recommend taking her.
Very great teacher/class. First A I have made in English.

Her hybrid class is amazing. I strongly suggest you take it. She is extremely helpful, nice, and funny teacher. Her class is easy as long as you do the few assignments and quizzes. She gives a lot of leeway and gives you multiple opportunities at the end of the semester to boost your grade.
I highly suggest you take this class for hybrid!!! As long as you do the few papers and the writing responses and online quizzes you'll make an easy A. She is a great, laid back, and funny teacher.

I HIGHLY RECCOMEND THIS PROFESSOR. This is a very easly class. The papers assigned are very easy. She doesn't grade harshly and allows late work without taking points off (even though she says she takes points off) She is very understanding if you must miss class. Easy Easy A!
very ditsy but funny and entertaining. pretty easy class as long as you do the work

Pretty good teacher and an easy class. I took Hybrid and she gives 1 learning module a week and only 3 papers. The only down side is she is hard to reach by email and if she cancels class, she usually sends an email the day of class to inform you.

She has a child that is often sick, so she misses class alot which throws the entire syllabus off.  She is a nice lady (and works with her students who need extra help), but she can be a little scattered.  It is difficult to keep up if you lack an interest.  Also avoid if you are not organized.

Do NOT take for 1102. Shes very scatterbrained and grades harshly. She assigned a paper every week. Overall she was a very sweet lady, but not a good teacher. If you can avoid it, dont take her class.
she's very goofy and it can be kind of distracting but the class was very easy. u just have to be organized and keep up with all the deadlines.
she was super easy. a little goofy but she was an easy teachers. u definitely need your book and you have to make sure you stay on top of all the due dates because work is ALWAYS due.

Someone spammed her page, which is why her rating is so low. Great teacher. I took the hybrid class: 3 papers, little quizzes and discussions online. Always offers to help in her off time. Posts weekly videos on youtube so students are up to date on what they need to be doing outside of class. Final is just all of the quiz questions in one exam. A+

Awesome professor! I hated writing till i got into her class. I took her as a hybrid. Online discussions that are graded for completion and quizzes you have two chances to complete. Very helpful and knows her stuff!

Summer/Spring hybrid course was awful. Literally a paper every week and a discussion every class. Random pop quizzes and difficult grading style for papers. If you want to take comp 2 (ENGL 1102) take it with someone who can actually teach. Sweet lady though.

do NOT take her class! i am not sure it is possible to make an A. all of my grades hinted that i should have one and when i emailed her to fix it she didnt respond. she was never on time for class. she gives pop quizzes. i think she meant well.. if only it were enough.
Decent teacher. Too many discussion assignments and talks way too much. Also, she is very anal about grading papers. Not recommended.

Teacher was awful. Honestly, you take nothing away from this course. Favored students, and either gave you an A or an F. There is no in between. Take for 1101, not 1102. 1101 is an easy A. 1102 is a completely different story.
Very good professor. She took the time out to help people individually. Very easy class. I got A's on essays I didn't think I did very good on.
Shes a GREAT professor, very fair and pretty easy. Im not an english person, and I got a high A in her class. Definetly take her!!

BEST english professor ever!! if your a terrible writer like me you will love her. she grades super easy and doesnt make you use big words in your essays. we had 4 or 5 essays that were at the most 4 to 5 pages long. I loved this professor and would absolutly recommend her if your looking for an easy A. I'm taking here again for 1102.

She was my favorite professor this semester. She was always willing to help you, and she is really nice. I took her hybrid class, and even though they aren't for me, it was fairly easy. We used 3 books, and had to write 4 major essays. I thoroughly enjoyed her class, and I'm disappointed I couldn't get her for 1102. I highly recommend her!

She is real easy, but she post grades inconsistent. She took points off my grade for late papers even though she agreed to let me because of a death in my family. Was not very pleased, every grade that was posted was an A. Whatever!! I lost total respect for this lady.

Summer hybrid course was great! One major essay two other essay type assignments leading into the major one. Book work and a book to read with discussion questions. Great class and prof. If you do the work it is an easy A.

She's one of the sweetest teachers ever. I took the hybrid class, and it was super easy. She gives you more than enough time to write your papers (there are only three). All quizzes and tests are online, including the final, which is open book!
Very helpful and just all around enjoyable. Easy book work and the rest of the class was essays that were, surprizingly for me, fun to write.
Crystal clear teacher makes learning the material extremely easy! She's great with her use of communication outside of class as well. Highly recommended!

She's pretty cool. Anything we don't talk about in class is posted on announcements in the beginning of the week. We have plenty of time for any and all assignments. Having writing teams is pretty fun too. She even tells us where to find people that can help us on our essays, we only have 4, if we get stuck or just need an eye to revise them.

She is a great professor! Her class is so easy. We wrote 4 papers the whole semester. She grades very easily. She is very entertaining and likes to discuss topics to help students learn the material. Class attendance is not mandatory at all. The only problem I had with her was that she NEVER answered my emails. But I made an A in the class with ver
Great teacher! Take her class if you can. Effective style in teaching, uses clear examples and is fair in grading. Always willing to help and work around to make it manageable to all students.
Extremely nice teacher.  Helpful and clear about everything you need to do.  Grades fairly.  Take her if you can.  Awesome.
she's definitely a sweetheart..she understands what students go thru so she gives enough time to finish the essays..am an international n i got an a in her class...she changed my mind about writing..

Lovely lady and TOP PROFESSOR. She gives plenty of time to do writing assigments. If you have issues writing, this class is for you. She makes sure that  you understand the writing process. Thanks to her, I have conquered my fear of writing. I've learned a lot in this class. I would definitely recommend her.

She is a sweetheart. Truly understanding,kind, and helpful.I'm an ESL student and I can't recommend a better teacher for a student like me. But she didn't do good on grading our stuff in time. It was almost the final and we finally found out our grades. But overall she is a great professor. She likes what she is doing. So she makes her best at it.

This class was great.  She basically split the class in half in order to make everyone more comfortable on discussion days. The tests are really easy and she is really good at making everyone feel comfortable.  You have one project grade and no papers!  She also grades really easily on tests.

GREAT prof! I've never enjoyed writing papers but she made them as painless as possible. Was able to write about whatever you wanted! She is very sweet and allowed plenty of time to complete papers! TAKE HER CLASS!

She is great! Shes quirky sometimes but she makes class so much fun and always makes sure you understand. She will personally take the time to sit with you until you get it!! Very easy on assignments! GREATEST TEACHER i have had...would def take her again!!!

She was very energetic and you could tell she loved to teach.  You can earn a ton of extra credit points and can revise papers to bring p your grade in the class. If you want a good teacher and a good grade go with her!
Professor Doss is awesome. She is hilarious yet she gets her point across. She is very fair when she grades papers and assignments. She's an excellent teacher.

She is a great teacher. She's fun, funny and has a great personality. She had me laughing through the entire course. I don't like essay writing, but her class wasn't bad. She is VERY helpful when you have questions, and will continue to explain until you understand. great teacher, i recommend getting her
I LOVED her class! She is so helpful and so entertaining during class time. Her assignments are simple, clear, and she gives you plenty of time in/out of class to work on them. She is awesome!
she is the greatest teacher i have eer had here at ksu! i took her for engl 1101 and engl 1102 i love her! interesting helpful and funny!
sweet and nice. good teacher
She is amazing and so fun! What a sweetheart!

Amazing teacher!my favorite teacher so far at KSU!If you dont understand something, she will help you until youfigure it out!she is not intimidating, very helpful!she has an interesting class and i actually learned something in her class!she knows how to teach!she makes it fun...TAKE HER CLASS!
